block.create_integrated_farming.lava_fis: Like the Lava Fishing Rod, the Lava Fishing Net _can only_ _fish_ in _lava_.
create_integrated_farming.ponder.lava_fi: Using Lava Fishing Net on Contraptions
Whenever Lava Fishing Nets are moved as part of an animated Contraption...
They will fish in lava, like a player fishing with a Lava Fishing Rod
Lava Fishing Net will catch small animal in lava
create_integrated_farming.ponder.spout.c: Forgetting process of Leteos Compost can be speed up via Spout in ultra warm dimension
Degradation process of Organic Compost can be speed up via Spout
